trans-unit.source: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder popup- eller elektronisk hjelp for kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Each instance of HelpProvider maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Hver forekomst av HelpProvider opprettholder en samling med referanser til kontroller knyttet til den.

trans-unit.source: To associate a Help file with the HelpProvider, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte en hjelpefilen til HelpProvider, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: You specify the type of Help provided by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method and providing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> value for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Du angi hvilken type hjelp fra kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>metoden og gir en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator>verdien for den angitte kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>

trans-unit.source: You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du oppgi nøkkelordet eller emnet hjelp ved å kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil åpne Hjelp for et bestemt emne nøkkelordet som skal sendes i formatet *topicName*htm.

trans-unit.source: To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil knytte en bestemt Hjelpestrengen til en kontroll, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som du knytte til en kontroll med denne metoden vises i et vindu ved å trykke F1 for når kontrollen har fokus.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property has not been set, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to provide the Help text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt, må du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>metode for å angi hjelpeteksten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you have set both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> and the Help string, Help based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt både <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>og Hjelpestrengen, hjelp basert på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>vil.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: HelpProvider calls methods on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help> class to provide Help functionality.
trans-unit.target: HelpProvider kaller metoder på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>klassen for å angi funksjonaliteten for hjelp.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Once you have created an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> method, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> method to associate your Help topics with a control.
trans-unit.target: Når du har opprettet en forekomst av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>klasse, må du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>metode, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A>metode for å knytte Hjelp-emnene til en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpNavigator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this object can provide its extender properties to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Angir om dette objektet har extender egenskapene til det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The object that the externder properties are provided to.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som externder egenskapene er angitt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can provide its extender properties; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet har extender egenskapene; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Help keyword for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer nøkkelordet hjelp for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> skal hentes hjelpeemnet fra.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with this control, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> is currently configured to display the entire Help file or is configured to provide a Help string.
trans-unit.target: Hjelp-nøkkelord som er tilknyttet denne kontrollen, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref> er konfigurert til å vise hele hjelpefilen eller er konfigurert til å angi en Hjelpestrengen.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> setting for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref> innstillingen for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help navigator.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> skal hentes navigatoren hjelp fra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> setting for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref> innstillingen for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the contents of the pop-up Help window for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer innholdet i popup-Hjelp-vinduet for kontrollen som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren trykker du F1 for å vise denne Hjelpestrengen ved kjøretid, mens den angitte kontrollen har inndata fokus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> from which to retrieve the Help string.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> skal hentes Hjelpestrengen fra.

trans-unit.source: The Help string associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Hjelpestrengen som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified control's Help should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den angitte kontrollen hjelp skal vises.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> method to associate a keyword or prompt with a specified control, calling this method automatically returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>metode for å knytte et nøkkelord eller ledeteksten med en angitt kontroll kalle denne metoden automatisk returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this behavior by passing `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne virkemåten ved å sende `false` til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetShowHelp%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which Help will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som hjelp vises.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Help will be displayed for the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Hjelp for kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir navnet på hjelpefilen knyttet til dette <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet hentet av denne metoden identifiserer filen som gir støtte for å få hjelp for alle kontrollene som inneholder dette objektet hjelp.

trans-unit.source: This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file.
trans-unit.target: Filnavnet kan angi en kompilerte hjelpefilen (.chm) eller en raw HTML-fil.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Help file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på hjelpefilen.

trans-unit.source: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være i formatet C:\path\sample.chm eller /folder/file.htm.

trans-unit.source: Removes the Help associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner hjelp knyttet til den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by the designer.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes av utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The control to remove Help from.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen for å fjerne hjelp fra.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the keyword used to retrieve Help when the user invokes Help for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Angir nøkkelordet brukes til å hente hjelp når brukeren aktiverer hjelp for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword provides the key information to retrieve the Help associated with this control from the Help file specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hjelp-nøkkelordet gir nøkkelinformasjon for å hente hjelp som er forbundet med denne kontrollen fra hjelpefilen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil åpne Hjelp for et bestemt emne nøkkelordet som skal sendes i formatet *topicName*htm.

trans-unit.source: To clear the keyword, call the SetHelpKeyword method with a `keyword` value of `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil fjerne nøkkelordet kalle metoden SetHelpKeyword med en `keyword` verdien `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that specifies the control for which to set the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som angir kontrollen for som du vil angi hjelpeemnet.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword to associate with the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelordet hjelp til å knytte til kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Help command to use when retrieving Help from the Help file for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Angir hjelp-kommandoen skal brukes ved henting av hjelp fra hjelpefilen for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which to set the Help keyword.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> å angi Hjelp-nøkkelordet.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The value of navigator is not one of the values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for navigator er ikke én av de verdier.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Help string associated with the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Angir Hjelpestrengen knyttet til den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Help string that you specify in the `helpString` parameter is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Hjelpestrengen du angir i den `helpString` parameteren vises i et vindu ved å trykke F1 for under den angitte kontrollen er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> with which to associate the Help string.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> som du kan knytte Hjelpestrengen.

trans-unit.source: The Help string associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Hjelpestrengen tilknyttet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether Help is displayed for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Angir om hjelp vises for den angitte kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: If you previously called the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> for the control specified in the `ctl` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> automatically displays Help for that control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du tidligere har kalt den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A>for kontrollen som er angitt i den `ctl` parameteren den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>automatisk viser Hjelp for denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpKeyword%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.SetHelpString%2A>

trans-unit.source: To modify this behavior, call the SetShowHelp method, specifying `false` in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Kall metoden SetShowHelp for å endre dette problemet ved å angi `false` i den `value` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> for which Help is turned on or off.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> for som hjelp er aktivert eller deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Help displays for the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis viser Hjelp for kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains supplemental data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir objektet som inneholder ytterligere data om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder data om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the type and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ToString returnerer en streng som inneholder typen og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>-egenskapen for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider.HelpNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider"> </xref>.
